# flexibleSpace()

**Type Method**

Creates a new flexible-width space item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func flexibleSpace() -> Self
```

## Return Value

A flexible-width space [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItem].

## Creating space items

- **fixedSpace(_:)**: Creates a new fixed-width space item.
- **fixedSpace()**: Creates a new fixed space item of zero width.
